meanings.definition: Of or relating to the shape of the Earth as approximated by a geoid.
meanings.sent1: The geoidal map showed the Earth's true shape.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the geoidal measurements of the planet.
meanings.sent3: The geoidal model of the globe made the students giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her geoidal interpretation of the world was eye-opening.
meanings.sent5: The geoidal representation of the Earth was incredibly accurate.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a geoid.
meanings.sent1: The geoidal rock had a unique shape.
meanings.sent2: The geoidal pattern on the surface was fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The geoidal clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent4: His geoidal haircut made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The geoidal sculpture was a masterpiece of art.
